responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "7C53E3FF471CFA325CF9AA8CA3D55F46", "The infamous burglar, of course. Only he could place his greed above the lives of all in the Riverlands if not the whole of Verra. He must have gained access to the secret prison of the priestess. No doubt he hopes to reap divine rewards while Deliath reaps our souls.")
name: MADD_0007_Phase04_TheBonekeeper_11
